tourSteps.content: This experience will walkthrough how to perform coreference annotation.
Displayed on the screen below is a document and two mentions.
The first Mention is automatically assigned to it's own Corefernce Cluster.
Clusters are managed in the cluster bank.
Clusters can be selected with the arrow keys, or by clicking on a previously asigned mention.
The current mention appears in purple.
The current mention can be assigned to the selected cluster with the SPACE bar.
Since the current mention acquired does not co-refer with the only existing mention in the Intel cluster assign it to a new cluster with the Ctrl + SPACE (Windows) or ALT + SPACE (MacOS) shortcut.
If you ever forget any of the controls all of CoRefi's functionality can be found in the help menu. Just click on the blue '?' in the bottom left of the screen.
Now using what you've learned assign the remaining mentions to the correct clusters until they are all assigned. Don't worry if you make mistakes you'll be guided to the correct answers.
